summary: Light those Draugr up with both hands!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#AFDCEC][size=5]Follow me on Twitter ([url=https://twitter.com/nujakujata]@nujakujata[/url])! If I get over 1k followers from this community, I'll create a Reinforced Chinese Stealth Suit mod for Fallout 4![/size]

Two-Handed Dawnbreaker[/color]
Author: Mars (aka Gaijune)
My Portfolio: marsashton.net
My Blog: marsashton.blogspot.com

Description
===============
This adds a two-handed version of Meridia's Dawnbreaker to the game, similar stat-wise to a Daedric Greatsword with the same enchantment as the one-handed Dawnbreaker.

Install
===============
1. Drag the included Data folder over to "(Program Files)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim"
2. Play!

Uninstall
===============
1. Delete the "mars" folder in "(Program Files)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim/data/meshes/weapons"

Location
===============
You can find it in-game, for now, next to Meridia's Shrine. Alternatively, you can use the following step-by-step process to add the item directly to your inventory.

Adding the item via console:
- Hit the '~' key
- Type "help dawnbreaker 4" without the quotes
- A list of IDs should appear. Note the 8-digit ID code next to the "Dawnbreaker Greatsword" line, which should be XX000D62, where XX will be two numbers.
- Type "player.additem XX000D62" without the quotes, replacing the X's with your two numbers from the list.

History
===============
v1.0 - Initial Release

Credits
===============
Thanks to YOU, for your consideration!
Thanks to Kim, the love of my life!
Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to the Nexus sites

Tools Used
===============

NIFSkope
The Creation Kit
author: gaijune
